other_title: コンクリート・レボルティオ～超人幻想～ (Japanese)
plot: Tokyo is flooded with countless heroes — chōjin — during the time of "apotheosis." Their origin stories are all different. While some were altered by evil organizations, others came from space, magical worlds, or are fairies from ancient times or robots. But the Japanese government could not simply close its eyes as these superheroes ran rampant.
opening_theme: "Katararezu Tomo" (カタラレズトモ) by ZAQ
insert_song: "Ano Subarashii Ai o Mō Ichido" (あの素晴らしい愛をもう一度) by Makoto Kawamoto (ep 1)
"Bang Bang Bang" (バンバンバン) by Keiichi Sogabe (ep 7)
"Chiisai Glass" (小さいグラス; Small Glass) by Angel Stars (eps 6,11,13)
"Gensō Revolution" (幻想レボリューション; Fantasy Revolution) by Mountain Horse (ep 6)
"Jiyū ni Aruite Aishite" (自由に歩いて愛して; Walk and Love Freely) by Angel Stars (ep 13)
"Jiyū ni Aruite Aishite" (自由に歩いて愛して; Walk and Love Freely) by Kyōko (ep 13)
"Kaze ga Naite Iru" (風が泣いている; The Wind is Crying) by Tooru Hidaka (ep 5)
"Ren'ai Anonymous" (恋愛アノニマス; Anonymous Love) by Angel Stars (ep 11)
"Seinen wa Kōya o Mezasu" (青年は荒野をめざす) by Gota Nishidera (ep 3)
"Sora ni Hoshi ga Aru yō ni" (空に星があるように) by Takashi Utsunomiya (ep 2)
